original_title: Pan Asia Bank partners with the National Chamber of Commerce and NEDA
original_body_lines: Pan Asia Bank is proud to have been a pivotal partner of the Western Province Entrepreneur Awards 2024. Organized by the National Chamber of Commerce of Sri Lanka (NCCSL) in collaboration with the National Enterprise Development Authority (NEDA), this annual awards event celebrates and recognizes the achievements of entrepreneurs across the Western Province.

As a forward-thinking financial institution, Pan Asia Bank remains committed to embracing and uplift entrepreneurship, which are key to driving economic growth for local Sri Lankan communities. The awards served as a platform to honor outstanding entrepreneurs across multiple sectors, which included Industry/Manufacturing, Agriculture/Livestock/Fisheries, and Hospitality/Tourism & Other Services.

This prestigious event was graced by the esteemed presence of Chathuranga Abeysinghe, Deputy Minister of the Ministry of Industry and Entrepreneurship Development as the Guest of Honour. Ms. W.T.R. Chandima, Chairperson/Director General, National Enterprise Development Authority as a Special Guest, Dhanuka Liyanagamage, Director NEDA, Deepal Nelson, President NCCSL and many senior officials of NEDA, NCCSL, Ministry of Industry and Entrepreneurship Development as well as Pan Asia Bank Director/CEO, Naleen Edirisinghe.

Speaking about Pan Asia Bank’s partnership, Naleen Edirisinghe, Director/CEO, stated, “We are honored to be in partnership with the NCCSL and NEDA to conduct the Western Province -Entrepreneur Awards 2024, a platform that aligns perfectly with our mission to build Sri Lanka’s entrepreneurial community. By supporting events like these, Pan Asia Bank reinforces its commitment to nurturing innovation and driving meaningful impact within the business ecosystem that will have a long-term benefit on the Sri Lankan Economy.”

The Western Province Entrepreneur Awards 2024 marks yet another milestone in Pan Asia Bank’s journey toward supporting entrepreneurial excellence and promoting sustainable economic development. The bank extends its heartfelt congratulations to all the award winners for their remarkable achievements and unwavering dedication to advancing Sri Lanka’s business landscape .
